# The 11 Best Wireless Headphones for Running and Working Out

It’s time to swap out your basic buds for a pair that goes the extra mile.

![](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)

By [Tucker Bowe](/author/221276/Tucker-Bowe/)

May 20, 2020

Gear Patrol

_This definitive guide to wireless headphones for running and working out
covers everything you need to know before buying your next pair of sweatproof
Bluetooth headphones, with picks for different budgets and activities._

 **Table of Contents**

 **Editor’s Picks**

  * Best Overall: Jaybird Vista
  * Runner Up: Beats Powerbeats Pro
  * Best Budget: Anker Soundcore Spirit X

 **Why You Need Sports Headphones**

 **The Rest of the Pack**

  * Apple AirPods Pro
  * Master & Dynamic MW07 Go
  * Sony WF-SP800N
  * Jabra Elite Active 75t
  * Google Pixel Buds
  * Beats Powerbeats
  * Jaybird Tarah Pro
  * Bose SoundSport Free

## The Top 3

Looking for quick recommendations on the best wireless headphones for running
and working out? Here are _Gear Patrol_ ‘s top three picks of 2020.

### Best Overall: Jaybird Vista

[](https://www.amazon.com/Jaybird-Wireless-Bluetooth-Waterproof-
Earbuds/dp/B07R9QJS9L/?tag=geapat-20)

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/Jaybird-Wireless-Bluetooth-Waterproof-
Earbuds/dp/B07R9QJS9L/?tag=geapat-20)

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/Jaybird-Wireless-Bluetooth-Waterproof-
Earbuds/dp/B07R9QJS9L/?tag=geapat-20)

**Water Resistance:** IPX7  
 **Charging Port:** USB-C  
 **Battery Life:** Up to 6 hours per earbud, 20 extra hours with charging case

The Jaybird Vistas are rugged wireless earbuds for serious athletes. They have
an IPX7 rating, meaning they’re fully waterproof and sweatproof. Their
lightweight design makes them feel like they’re not even in your ears, and the
carrying case is slimmer than that of the competition. They are compatible
with a companion app that allows you to change the EQ settings or borrow the
EQ settings that have been used by some of Jaybird’s sponsored athletes.

[Buy Now: $180](https://www.amazon.com/Jaybird-Wireless-Bluetooth-Waterproof-
Earbuds/dp/B07R9QJS9L/?tag=geapat-20)

### Runner Up: Beats Powerbeats Pro

[](https://www.amazon.com/Powerbeats-Pro-Totally-Wireless-
Earphones/dp/B07R5QD598?tag=geapat-20)

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/Powerbeats-Pro-Totally-Wireless-
Earphones/dp/B07R5QD598?tag=geapat-20)

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/Powerbeats-Pro-Totally-Wireless-
Earphones/dp/B07R5QD598?tag=geapat-20)

**Water-Resistance:** IPX4  
 **Charging Port:** Lightning  
 **Battery Life:** Up to 9 hours per earbud, 24 total hours with charging case  

The Powerbeats Pro are similar to the AirPods Pro because they’re both made by
Apple and have the same H1 chip that makes it easy to pair with an iPhone.
Runners, in particular, will appreciate the large ear hooks that grip and hold
the earbuds in place. The nine-hour battery life — with up to 20 extra hours
from the carrying case — is unmatched, though said carrying case is _huge_ ,
making these less than ideal for everyday wear. They’re also more expensive
than the competition.

[Buy Now: ~~$230~~ $200 (Amazon)](https://www.amazon.com/Powerbeats-Pro-
Totally-Wireless-Earphones/dp/B07R5QD598?tag=geapat-20)

[Buy Now: ~~$230~~ $200
(Apple)](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMV6Y2LL%2FA%2Fpowerbeats-
pro-totally-wireless-earphones-
black&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

### Best Budget: Anker Soundcore Spirit X

[](https://www.amazon.com/Bluetooth-Headphones-Soundcore-SweatGuard-
Technology/dp/B07B9R67WR/?tag=geapat-20)

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/Bluetooth-Headphones-Soundcore-SweatGuard-
Technology/dp/B07B9R67WR/?tag=geapat-20)

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/Bluetooth-Headphones-Soundcore-SweatGuard-
Technology/dp/B07B9R67WR/?tag=geapat-20)

**Water Resistance:** IPX7  
 **Charging Port:** Micro-USB  
 **Battery Life:** Up to 12 hours  

Anker’s Soundcore Spirit Xs are a great pair of no-frills neckbuds. They are
extremely sweat- and water-resistant and have an ear hook design, similar to
the Powerbeats3 Wireless, so they’ll fit most people’s ears. And for around
$40, the sound quality is actually pretty good.

[Buy Now: ~~$40~~ $36](https://www.amazon.com/Bluetooth-Headphones-Soundcore-
SweatGuard-Technology/dp/B07B9R67WR/?tag=geapat-20)

## Why You Need Sports Headphones

Not all headphones work for running or
[exercising](https://gearpatrol.com/2016/03/09/7-minute-workout-wahoo-
fitness/), even if they are wireless. If you have a pair that isn’t
sweatproof, there’s a good chance they’ll die on you. And if they don’t fit
your ears, well, they’re probably not going to stay in, either.

Sport headphones add a new dimension to your workout. They’re light,
comfortable and designed to stay securely in your ears during high-intensity
intervals. So if you often find yourself lifting weights, [running on the
roads or trails](https://gearpatrol.com/2013/10/03/complete-guide-running-
first-marathon/), or doing a [total body
workout](https://gearpatrol.com/2015/05/18/three-fast-workouts/), it’s time to
swap out your basic buds for a pair that goes the extra mile.

## The Rest of the Pack

### Apple AirPods Pro

[](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMWP22AM%2FA%2Fairpods-
pro&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-headphones-
for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

[
](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMWP22AM%2FA%2Fairpods-
pro&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-headphones-
for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

[
](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMWP22AM%2FA%2Fairpods-
pro&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-headphones-
for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

**Water-Resistance:** IPX4  
 **Charging Port:** Lightning, wireless charging case  
 **Battery Life:** Up to 5 hours per earbud, 24 total hours with charging case  

These “pro-level” AirPods are the first wireless earbuds that Apple has ever
made that are sweat-resistant, which is great news for runners, as well as
noise-canceling, which is great everybody else. They have a silicone ear tip
so they fit tighter than Apple’s regular AirPods. On the sort-of downside,
they have the same battery life as regular AirPods (and even less life when
noise-canceling is turned on).

[Buy Now:
$249](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.apple.com%2Fshop%2Fproduct%2FMWP22AM%2FA%2Fairpods-
pro&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-headphones-
for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

### Master & Dynamic MW07 Go

[](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jaybirdsport.com%2Fen-
us%2Ftarah-
pro.985-000822.html&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

[
](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jaybirdsport.com%2Fen-
us%2Ftarah-
pro.985-000822.html&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

[
](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jaybirdsport.com%2Fen-
us%2Ftarah-
pro.985-000822.html&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

**Water Resistance:** IPX6  
 **Charging Port:** USB-C  
 **Battery Life:** Up to 10 hours per earbud; 12 extra hours with charging
case

Master & Dynamic released the original MW07 in 2018 and we called them [“the
most beautiful wireless earbuds you can
buy.”](https://gearpatrol.com/2018/10/03/master-dynamic-mw07-true-wireless-
earphones-review/) They’re made of acetate and stainless steel are just
gorgeous. The 2019-released MW07 Go aren’t quite as “premium,” but they’re
also a bit different. They’re made of an ultra-durable TR90 composite
material, which makes them water- and sweat-resistant. They’re also 15-percent
smaller and lighter than the original MW07, which will help them better stay
in your ears while you’re working out.

[Buy Now:
$200](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.masterdynamic.com%2Fproducts%2Fmw07-go-
true-wireless-
earphones&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

### Sony WF-SP800N

[](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B087NHX6ZR??tag=geapat-20)

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B087NHX6ZR??tag=geapat-20)

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B087NHX6ZR??tag=geapat-20)

**Water Resistance:** IP55  
 **Charging Port:** USB-C  
 **Battery Life:** 9 hours listening time (9 extra hours with case)  

The Sony WF-SP800N are unique on this list because they are wireless earbuds
that are designed for working out, but they also have active noise-
cancellation similar to the company’s flagship WF-1000XM3. The Sony WF-SP800N
don’t quite have the sound quality or noise-cancelling abilities of the
WF-1000XM3, however, because they lack the same QN1e processor. That said,
they’re $30 cheaper.

[BUY NOW: $200 (Amazon)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B087NHX6ZR??tag=geapat-20)

[Read the Review](https://gearpatrol.com/2020/05/13/sony-wf-sp800n-review/)

### Jabra Elite Active 75t

[](https://www.amazon.com/Jabra-Elite-
Active-75t-Earbuds/dp/B082Y2KM92?tag=geapat-20)

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/Jabra-Elite-
Active-75t-Earbuds/dp/B082Y2KM92?tag=geapat-20)

[ ](https://www.amazon.com/Jabra-Elite-
Active-75t-Earbuds/dp/B082Y2KM92?tag=geapat-20)

**Water Resistance:** IP57  
 **Charging Port:** USB-C  
 **Battery Life:** 7.5 hours listening time (up to 28 hours with case)  

These are “active” versions of the Jabra Elite 75t that were released earlier
in 2020. What that means is that they’re identical in every way, except
they’re more water-resistant, they have a stickier coating so they stay in
your ear better, and they’re slightly more expensive. Aside from that, these
are some of the best all-around wireless earbuds you buy in 2020.

[BUY NOW: $200 (Amazon)](https://www.amazon.com/Jabra-Elite-
Active-75t-Earbuds/dp/B082Y2KM92?tag=geapat-20)

[BUY NOW: $200
(Jabra)](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jabra.com%2Fbluetooth-
headsets%2Fjabra-elite-
active-75t%23%23100-99091000-02&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

### Google Pixel Buds

[](https://store.google.com/us/product/pixel_buds)

[ ](https://store.google.com/us/product/pixel_buds)

[ ](https://store.google.com/us/product/pixel_buds)

**Water Resistance:** IPX4  
 **Charging Port:** USB-C and wireless  
 **Battery Life:** 5 hours listening time (up to 24 hours with case)  

Google’s second-generation Pixel Buds are exactly what Pixel owners have
deserved for years: wireless earbuds that work well and easily pair with all
Pixel and Android devices (no opening Bluetooth settings required). They have
intuitive touch controls and premium features that only Google could deliver,
like a conversation mode integrated with Google Translate. Additionally, they
have an earwing design and IPX4 water-resistance rating, so they make a great
workout partner.

[BUY NOW: $179 (Google)](https://store.google.com/us/product/pixel_buds)

[Read the Review](https://gearpatrol.com/2020/05/04/google-pixel-buds-review/)

### Beats Powerbeats

[](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2Fbeats-
by-dr-dre-powerbeats-high-performance-wireless-earphones-
black%2F6397373.p%3F&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

[
](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2Fbeats-
by-dr-dre-powerbeats-high-performance-wireless-earphones-
black%2F6397373.p%3F&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

[
](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2Fbeats-
by-dr-dre-powerbeats-high-performance-wireless-earphones-
black%2F6397373.p%3F&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

**Water Resistance:** IPX4  
 **Charging Port:** Lightning  
 **Battery Life:** Up to 15 hours  

The Powerbeats are the next generation of the company’s Powerbeats3 Wireless
that were released in 2016. The new Powerbeats have been integrated with
Apple’s H1 chip for fast pairing with your iPhone, just like AirPods and
AirPods Pro, but it also enables them to charge faster and get significantly
better battery life. As far as design, fit and sound, the Powerbeats are
essentially more affordable, neckbud versions of the truly wireless Powerbeats
Pro.

[Buy Now:
$150](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fsite%2Fbeats-
by-dr-dre-powerbeats-high-performance-wireless-earphones-
black%2F6397373.p%3F&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

### Jaybird Tarah Pro

[](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jaybirdsport.com%2Fen-
us%2Ftarah-
pro.985-000822.html&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

[
](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jaybirdsport.com%2Fen-
us%2Ftarah-
pro.985-000822.html&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

[
](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jaybirdsport.com%2Fen-
us%2Ftarah-
pro.985-000822.html&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

**Water Resistance:** IPX7  
 **Charging Port:** Pogo pin connector  
 **Battery Life:** Up to 14 hours  

Released in 2018, these are Jaybird’s highest-end neckbuds and, frankly, some
of the best wireless earbuds you can buy. They are completely sweatproof and
waterproof, and because they have tremendous battery life — up to 14 hours on
a single charge — they’re really designed for ultra runners and endurance
athletes. A neat and under-appreciated feature: the two earbuds magnetically
stick together so you can wear the Tarah Pro around your neck, as a necklace,
when you’re not listening to them.

[Buy Now:
$160](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jaybirdsport.com%2Fen-
us%2Ftarah-
pro.985-000822.html&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gearpatrol.com%2Ftech%2Fa242559%2Fbest-
headphones-for-
running%2F%3Fpre%3Dtech%252F%26prefix%3Da%26id%3D242559%26del%3D%26variantId%3D%26post%3D%252Fbest-
headphones-for-running)

### Bose SoundSport Free

[](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bose.com%2Fen_us%2Fproducts%2Fheadphones%2Fearphones%2Fsoundsport-

**Water Resistance:** IPX4  
 **Charging Port:** Micro-USB  
 **Battery Life:** Up to six hours  

One of the great things about Bose is that all of its in-ear headphones,
whether wired or wireless, fit the same, so if you know they’ll fit in your
ears before you even order them (so long as you’ve worn Bose’s earbuds with
StayHear+ tips before). The SoundSport Free are solid wireless earbuds with
Bose signature sound. The catch is that these earbuds are several years old
and Bose is expected to release two new versions, the [Bose Earbuds
500](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bose.com%2Fen_us%2Fbetter_with_bose%2Fnew-

headphones-for-running) and [Bose Noise Cancelling Earbuds
700](https://go.redirectingat.com/?id=31959X896062&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bose.com%2Fen_us%2Fbetter_with_bose%2Fnew-
